title: Bergamot and Wildberry Nicotine Pouches by Nordic Spirit
description: TRY NORDIC SPIRIT BERGAMOT WILD BERRY NICOTINE POUCHES Bergamot Wildberry Nicotine Pouches by Nordic Spirit offers a mouth-wateringly fruity experience with efficient nicotine satisfaction. View all Nordic Spirit Nicotine Pouches View all Fruity Pouches View all Low Strength Pouches View all Extra Strong Pouches KEY FEATURES: Bergamot Wildberry flavoured nicotine pouches Low (6mg/pouch), Medium (9mg/pouch) and Strong (11mg/pouch) Great option for those looking to quit smoking Efficient nicotine satisfaction No tobacco, no vapour, no smoke Discreet design makes them suitable for use in all environments Compact tub is easy and convenient to carry around MORE ABOUT BERGAMOT WILDBERRY FLAVOURED NICOTINE POUCHES The tropical and floral flavours of the bergamot blend perfectly with the fresh, natural wildberry, creating a perfectly balanced flavour. The mixture of flavours will leave an alluring taste in your mouth and the effective nicotine will keep your hands away from the cigarettes. MORE ABOUT NICOTINE POUCHES Nordic Spirit is an exceptional range of tobacco-free nicotine pouches. These pouches provide you with an unbeatable nicotine experience, ensuring that you don't reach for the cigarettes again. Nicotine pouches do not produce smoke or vapour, meaning you can use them discreetly wherever, whenever. Nordic Spirit tubs include twenty soft, slim pouches that fit snugly under your lip. Once finished, the tub features a handy compartment for you to dispose of your used pouch simply and cleanly. Additional Description Information: Brand Name: Nordic Spirit Product Type: Nicotine Pouches Pouch Format: Slim Our Strength Rating: Low | Medium Nicotine per Pouch (mg/pouch) 6 MG | 9 MG | 12MG Flavour Name: Bergamot Wildberry Flavour: Wildberry Pouches per can: 20 Shipping from: London, UK
